# List of Religion Zites

**[About Islam](/17orvGa6rdFUjPxuXk5eMdP1bfubNfe8Lu).**
Stories about Islam from around the world.

**[Bible4u](/1BiBLE4U2fLzhr5i2nt1Uxz57CzWktdTSv)**  A free Bible for You with a several translations available to read and download.

**[Green Buddhism](/1BuddhaD5KvaTFEgJKbGPcmEQmuqrQBVkn)** A cosmist religion for immortals, based on Buddhism. 

**[Islam News](/1HmgSZeR3e2UJuoVpvVMcYuQC7Ey2xAiWD).**
News stories about Islam from around the world.
